Message_OwnerStart:
😊 *Hi!* I'm your `pmcenter` bot, and I work just for you.
This message means that you've set up the bot successfully.
To reply to any forwarded messages, just directly reply to them here.

Thank you for using the `pmcenter` bot!
Message_UserStartDefault:
📨 *Hi!* To send anything to my owner, just send it here.
⚠ To be informed: I'll *automatically* ban flooding users.
Message_ForwardedToOwner: ✅ Your message has been forwarded to my owner!
Message_Help:
❓ `pmcenter` *Bot Help*
/start - Display welcome message.
/info - Display the message's info.
/ban - Restrict the user from contacting you.
/banid <ID> - Restrict a user from contacting you with his/her ID.
/pardon - Pardon the user.
/pardonid <ID> - Pardon a user with his/her ID.
/ping - Test if the bot is working.
/switchfw - Pause/Resume message forwarding.
/switchbw - Enable/Disable keyword banning.
/switchnf - Enable/Disable notifications.
/switchlang <URL> - Switch language file.
/saveconf - Manually save all settings and translations. Especially useful after upgrades.
/readconf - Reload configurations without restarting bot.
/uptime - Check system uptime information.
/update - Check for updates and update bot.
/chkupdate - Only check for updates.
/catconf - Get your current configurations.
/restart - Restart bot.
/status - Get host device's status information.
/help - Display this message.

Thank you for using `pmcenter`!
Message_UserBanned: 🚫 The user has been banned permanently.
Message_CommandNotReplying: 😶 Don't talk to me, spend time chatting with those who love you.
Message_CommandNotReplyingValidMessage: 😐 Speaking to me makes no sense.
Message_UserServicePaused:
🚧 *Sorry...*
Your messages won't be forwarded to my lord, currently.
Message_AlreadyUpToDate:
✅ *Already up to date*!
Latest version: `$1`
Currently installed: `$2`
Update details:
`$3`
Message_UpdateFinalizing: ✅ Files patching complete! Trying to restart...

Message_SupportTextMessagesOnly: 📋 Sorry... Only text messages can be forwarded in Anonymous Forward mode.
Message_ForwarderNotReal:
ℹ The actual sender of this message is $1, whose UID is `$2`.

You can also ban this user by sending this following command:

`/banid $2`

To undo this, send this command:

`/pardonid $2`
Message_LangVerMismatch: ⚠ Language file ($1) is not for current version ($2), consider updating language file?
